search.query: |inputlookup confSessions |search [search index=* | head 1 |fields |eval Session_ID="$ownSessions$" |table Session_ID | makemv Session_ID delim="," |mvexpand Session_ID |return 10000 Session_ID] | table startTime endTime title description location speakers |makemv speakers delim=";;" | sort 0 - startTime
